name: Steam
description: Steam was a photo I took on my first day in Japan. We had just landed and packed our stuff in the hotel, that night I was restless. I did not manage to sleep, I was too excited. I walked out of the room while my girlfriend was asleep and walked around alone in Shinjuku, looking at those cool new buildings and architecture I have never seen before, snapping as much content as possible and listening to the city noise. One of the area, close to the hotel, was a complete labyrinth of pipes and very steamy. I really liked this picture, despite being a sky photo, you cannot see the sky on this one. The piling up of buildings, being way too dense..
